member.name: T:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings
member.summary: This provides the options for the drawing/rendering engine of the WPF.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.#ctor
member.overloads: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default parameters and settings.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.#ctor(SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified initial drawing or rendering settings, a copy constructor.
member.param: This specifies the initial options for the rendering or drawing engine.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.Clone
member.overloads: This creates a new settings object that is a deep copy of the current instance.
member.summary: This creates a new settings object that is a deep copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new settings object that is a deep copy of this instance.
member.remarks: This is deep cloning of the members of this settings object. If you need just a copy, use the copy constructor to create a new instance.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.System#ICloneable#Clone
member.summary: This creates a new settings object that is a deep copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new settings object that is a deep copy of this instance.
member.remarks: This is deep cloning of the members of this style object. If you need just a copy, use the copy constructor to create a new instance.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.OptimizePath
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the path geometry is optimized using the .
member.value: This is if the path geometry is optimized using the ; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.TextAsGeometry
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the texts are rendered as path geometry.
member.value: This is if texts are rendered as path geometries; otherwise, this is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.IncludeRuntime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes are used in the generated output.
member.value: This is if the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes and types are used in the generated output; otherwise, it is . The default is .
member.remarks: The use of the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll prevents the hard-coded font path generated by the class, support for embedded images etc.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the main culture information used for rendering texts.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the main culture information for texts. The default is the English culture.

remarks.para: This is the culture information passed to the class instance for the text rendering.
The library does not currently provide any means of splitting texts into its multi-language parts.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.NeutralCultureInfo
member.summary: Gets the neutral language for text rendering.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the neutral culture information for texts. The default is the English culture.
member.remarks: For vertical text rendering, there is a basic text splitting into Western and other languages. This culture information is used to render the Western language part, and the mains culture information for the other languages.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.DefaultFontName
member.summary: Gets or sets the default font family name, which is used when a text node does not specify a font family name.
member.value: A string containing the default font family name. The default is the Arial Unicode MS font, for its support of Unicode texts. This value cannot be or empty.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.DefaultFontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the globally available default font family.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the globally available font family. The default is a Arial Unicode MS font family.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.GenericSerif
member.summary: Gets or set the globally available generic serif font family.
member.value: An instance of specifying the generic serif font family. The default is Times New Roman font family.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.GenericSansSerif
member.summary: Gets or set the globally available generic sans serif font family.
member.value: An instance of specifying the generic sans serif font family. The default is Tahoma font family.
member.remarks: The possible font names are Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, Trebuchet, MS Sans Serif and Helvetica.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings.GenericMonospace
member.summary: Gets or set the globally available generic Monospace font family.
member.value: An instance of specifying the generic Monospace font family. The default is MS Gothic font family.

member.summary: The renderer's SvgWindow object.
